headline: Willis Towers Watson Public Limited Company (WTW): Among Billionaire David Abrams’ Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential
summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire David Abrams’ 10 Stock Picks with Huge Upside Potential. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Willis Towers Watson Public Limited Company (NASDAQ:WTW) stands against other stock picks with huge upside potential.
